content: with 3 single_crochet in each corner st making sure to go through all thicknesses through the cover and pockets where they are joined removing the safety pins as you come to them join with slip_stitch to the first single_crochet made finish off round 2 with f hook and tan join with single_crochet in any corner st single_crochet twice more in the same st then single_crochet in each single_crochet around with 3 single_crochet in each corner st join with slip_stitch to the first single_crochet made finish off round 3 with f hook and scarlet join with single_crochet in the bottom left hand corner single_crochet twice more in the same st then single_crochet in each single_crochet up to the middle of the left side this is where you will make the ties to close the needle roll chain 47 slip_stitch in the back loop of the 2nd chain from hook and in ea chain across single_crochet in the next single_crochet on the left side chain 87 slip_stitch in the back loop of the 2nd chain from hook and in ea chain across single_crochet in the next single_crochet on the left side and in each single_crochet around the rest of the needle roll with 3 single_crochet in each corner st join with sl st to the first single_crochet made finish off small flower motifs optional make 10 8 with scarlet 2 with teal with e hook and scarlet teal chain 2 round 1 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 9 times more in the same single_crochet join with slip_stitch to the first single_crochet 10 single_crochet round 2 *chain 5 skip next single_crochet slip_stitch in the next single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to the first slip_stitch finish off using the tapestry needle and clear thread sew a flower to each small pocket and arrange four of the
